DOC.criteria: English speaking chronic pain ( > 3 month ) area , currently experience neck shoulder pain , previous history neck shoulder pain ( operationally define experience neck shoulder pain longer 48 hour seek medical treatment neck shoulder pain ) , neurological impairment upperextremity ( determined loss sensation , muscle weakness , reflex change ) , regular participation upperextremity weight training , currently regular use pain medication , previous history upperextremity surgery . Additional exclusion criterion propranolol administration report history presence follow cardiovascular condition : clinically significant abnormal 12lead ECG , sinus bradycardia ( rest heart rate 55 beat per minute ) , great first degree heart block , cardiac failure , coronary artery disease , uncontrolled hypertension ( rest systolic blood pressure 140 mm Hg ) , hypotension ( rest systolic blood pressure 90 mm Hg ) , WolffParkinsonWhite syndrome . Noncardiovascular reason study exclusion include : bronchial asthma , nonallergic bronchospasm , history recent major surgery require general anesthesia , diabetes , pregnancy , major depression .
